doc:
Elizabeth McGovern https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elizabeth_McGovern 0 Elizabeth Lee McGovern (born July 18, 1961) is an American film, television, and theater actress, and musician. She received an Academy Award nomination for her role as Evelyn Nesbit in the 1981 film Ragtime. She is also known for her performance as Cora Crawley, Countess of Grantham in the British drama series Downton Abbey, for which she has been nominated for an Emmy Award and Golden Globe Award. Her other films include Ordinary People (1980), Once Upon a Time in America (1984), The Handmaid's Tale (1990) and The Wings of the Dove (1997). Elizabeth_Lee_McGovern ( born July_18_,_1961 ) is an_American_film , television , and theater_actress , and musician . She received an_Academy_Award_nomination for her_role as Evelyn_Nesbit in the_1981_film_Ragtime . She is_also_known for her_performance as Cora_Crawley , Countess of Grantham in the_British_drama_series_Downton_Abbey , for which she has_been_nominated for an_Emmy_Award and Golden_Globe_Award . Her_other_films include Ordinary_People ( 1980_) , Once Upon a_Time in America_(_1984_) , The_Handmaid 's_Tale_(_1990_) and The_Wings of the_Dove_(_1997_) .
